characters.name: Black Ninja
characters.description: A stealthy and agile ninja known for his combat skills.

characters.description: A ninja with control over water and ice elements.

characters.description: A powerful character with the ability to shoot energy blasts.

characters.description: A crystalline hero with unbreakable defenses.

characters.description: A ninja with mastery over nature and earth elements.

characters.description: A fiery hero with pyrokinetic abilities.

characters.description: A ninja with mastery over fire elements.

characters.name: Upgrade
characters.description: A technological being capable of merging with machines.

characters.description: A ninja with light-based powers and incredible speed.

characters.description: A wise master of elemental arts.
